summary: Comprehensive testing of JWT authentication system with RBAC completed. Backend APIs working correctly (94.7% success rate) and frontend UI fully functional with proper role-based access control, user management, and visual elements.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no token provided
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate unauthorized access

passed_tests: Login with valid credentials redirects correctly by role (admin -> /admin, asesor -> /asesor, cliente -> /cliente)
Login with invalid credentials shows proper error message
Protected routes work correctly - admin area only accessible by admin role
Asesor and cliente roles properly blocked from admin area
Banner visible on all pages (login, dashboards, unauthorized)
WhatsApp button visible and functional on all pages
Admin can create new users with proper form validation
Admin can view all users in management interface
Admin can search users by name/email
Edit and delete buttons present for user management
Role badges display correctly with proper colors and icons
API /api/auth/login works correctly for all user types
API /api/users CRUD operations work correctly for admin
Non-admin users properly blocked from user management APIs
Self-deletion protection works for admin users
User creation form includes all required fields and role selection
Navigation and layout elements work properly
